data.text:
Brussels, 11 July 2002

Official Visit to Slovakia by Pat COX

Pat COX, President of the European Parliament, will be visiting Slovakia on 13 July 2002. The visit is part of a series of official visits Mr Cox has been making to Candidate Countries.

Mr Cox will be holding official meetings with Mr Rudolf Schuster, President of the Slovak Republic, Mr Mikulá Dzurinda, the Prime Minister of the Slovak Republic, and Mr Jozef Miga, the President of the National Council. Mr Cox will also address the Parliament of the Slovak Republic.

During these meetings he will raise key issues relating to Slovakia's accession to the European Union.

The main elements of the Programme are attached below:

PROGRAMME

SATURDAY 13 JULY 2002

8.45-9.25: Meeting with Mr Rudolf Schuster, the President of the Slovak Republic

Presidential Palace

9.30-9.55: Meeting with Mr Jozef Miga, the President of the National Council

National Council Building, A.Dubèeka 1

10.05-10.30: Address by Mr Pat Cox to the Members of the National Council

10.40-11.15: Joint Press Conference of the Presidents

11.25-11.55: Meeting with Mr Mikulá Dzurinda, the Prime Minister of the Slovak Republic

Office of the Government

12.00-12.45: Meeting with leaders of the opposition parties

National Council Building, A.Dubèeka 1

For further information please contact Alison Suttie, Press Officer, tel. + 32 478 359 596
